channel.title: Programming on Data Science Garage
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Data Science Garage

item.title: 1.1 R Syntax Basics
item.description: R Syntax basics (R as a passive-aggressive butler) VIDEO 1.1 SCRIPT 1.1 Use this to follow along on this page and for the Practice exercises below. Overview R is a programming language and popular open source software design to help non-programmers perform statistical analyses and to make graphs. This page is intended to guide people through some of the basics of the R programming language, just enough to get started.

item.title: 1.2 Functions and Packages
